verbs.description: pink locomotive delivery marks a first for ge fort worth plant the two locomotives ge [ARG1: transportation] [V: made] [ARGM-MNR: in fort worth] [ARGM-CAU: for a mining company] called roy hill marked a couple of firsts for the giant of the transportation equipment industry australia ceo president and ceo ge general electric co nyse john flannery nalin jain ge transportation fort worth gina rinehart chairman roy hill breast cancer locomotive fort worth intermodal transportation center general electric
